page.title: 02 School Farm Nursery
page.content: School Farm Nursery is an 8 acre nursery on the main A144 Bungay to Halesworth road at Ilketshall St. Lawrence.It is owned by Mr. Baggott. Mr. Baggott sells shrubs, trees, flowers, herbs and heathers.The cost ranges from 50 pence to 8 pounds. Heathers are the most popular.He does not sell indoor pot plants. The customers are from the local villages and towns.He gets about 4 or 5 customers a day and he takes orders.He buys his seed from King and Son Ltd. Mr. Baggott used to be a builder until he hurt his back. He has to use special long handled gardening tools.
